name: Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery
title: Elemental Resonance: Growing Greenery
desc: New branches and sprouts grow into a forest.

skills.desc:
During this round, the next Elemental Reaction your active character triggers deals +2 DMG.
Your Burning Flame, Dendro Core, and Catalyzing Field gain +1 Usage(s).
(You must have at least 2 Dendro characters in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
